case_studies.title: Canadian insurer drives higher revenue, customer engagement, brand loyalty with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Co-operators’ digital transformation wins 130% more quotes, 50% more conversions, and 40% efficiency gain.
case_studies.project_brief: Leading Canadian insurer, Co-operators, has achieved a remarkable digital transformation powered by Sitecore. Business performance and revenue generation, customer engagement, brand loyalty and operational efficiency have all seen significant improvement. Customers spend more time on the website, find the insurance products they want faster, and are converted to paying customers quicker.

stats.label: home and auto policies via digital
faster time to market for new content

challenge.headline: From an acorn to a great oak of the co-operative movement
challenge.text: Co-operators is a leading Canadian financial services cooperative, offering multi-line insurance and investment products, services and personalized advice to help Canadians build their financial strength and security. As it celebrates 80 years of providing trusted guidance to Canadians coast to coast, Co-operators has more than $60 billion in assets under administration. Co-operators has multiple channels to market including web, social media, and its mobile app. Co-operators leaned into digital transformation early on, recognizing a rapidly evolving landscape that changed how clients consume information and conduct business. In addition to improving the client experience, the company saw an opportunity for digital tools to improve efficiency, productivity and automation. The strategy was to shift to a cloud-based digital experience platform to support a dynamic, agile website, meet growing traffic demand and deliver a true ecommerce experience. Co-operators also wanted to increase brand awareness, improve lead generation, creating stronger engagement with customers, and deliver impactful interactions with audiences.

solution.headline: Seamless personalization
solution.text: Working with Sitecore partner Deloitte Digital, Co-operators has integrated Salesforce Marketing Cloud with Sitecore XP hosted on Sitecore Managed Cloud to power digital transformation and website improvement. With its modernized, SEO-enhanced digital experience platform and website, Co-operators has strengthened brand awareness, developed content consistency, and enhanced the customer experience across multiple channels and customer touchpoints. Integration between Sitecore and Salesforce supports over 100 personalized campaigns targeting multiple personas. Sitecore Authoring enables internal, non-technical teams to launch content four times faster. Other integrations such as the National Quote & Buy app improves the customer journey, increasing leads and acquisitions. “We don’t just try to be the best insurance website, we aim to be the best digital experience, so whether it’s searching for insurance or groceries online, you get what you expect to see from a digital provider,” said Mike Bruno AVP, Digital at Co-operators.

outcome.headline: Revenue and customer experience transformation
outcome.text: Sitecore has enabled Co-operators to transform customer engagement and revenue creation. Now the company generates 40% of its home and auto policies via digital channels with quotes up by 130% and conversions up 50%+. Better content, personalization, and navigation have led to 17% growth in product relevancy, 15%+ more time on site, 13%+ more visitor returns, and 11% faster page loads. Operational improvements and removing technical barriers such as out-of-the-box Sitecore editor means time to market is down from two days to 20 minutes and a 40% rise in efficiency representing a saving of $200,000 a year. Sitecore modular content has saved 200% more time and made finding assets up to 100% easier. Leveraging better customer insights which showed web-savvy millennials buying rental insurance, Co-operators can now also identify cross-sell opportunities. “Sitecore enables Co-operators to speak to many different audiences, customize experiences across our website and ensure our digital storefront addresses all visitor preferences. It drives the right interactions, we launch comprehensive campaigns faster, and refresh content daily,” said Bruno.

testimonial.quote: Sitecore is a resounding success. It has helped revolutionize our digital presence, drive brand awareness, enhance customer engagement, and deliver personalized experiences. It also achieved a remarkable increase in lead generation, and greater customer retention and brand loyalty. Sitecore empowers Co-operators to adapt to market trends, exceed customer expectation, and solidify our industry leader position.

case_studies.title: Pet Supplies Plus on track to boost sales and satisfaction with Sitecore replatform
case_studies.overview: US pet supplies retailer establishes integrated digital platform with seamless content management, digital asset management, and headless ecommerce on Sitecore.
case_studies.project_brief: Pet Supplies Plus partnered with Horizontal Digital to implement an end‑to‑end digital platform based on composable Sitecore technologies.

challenge.headline: Establishing a digital environment fit for growth
challenge.text: The company’s legacy web platform lacked the necessary features and flexibility to support its goals... legacy technologies made integrations challenging, increased maintenance costs, and resulted in performance issues and downtime...

solution.headline: An end-to-end modern experience platform
solution.text: ...migrated to a modern experience platform built on composable Sitecore technologies. Sitecore XM Cloud streamlines content management... Sitecore Content Hub Operations enhances digital team collaboration... With Sitecore Content Hub DAM, Pet Supplies Plus can centrally manage all its digital assets, while Sitecore OrderCloud enables scalable, next‑generation headless commerce. Additionally, Sitecore Discover is being integrated to personalize product search results... The Sitecore‑based headless architecture seamlessly integrates with advanced digital tools and improves website reliability... includes front‑end hosting on Vercel.

outcome.headline: Increasing sales and customer satisfaction
outcome.text: The new Sitecore DXP will help Pet Supplies Plus unlock greater growth with scalability... Improved performance and the ability to cope with peaks in demand, combined with advanced capabilities such as personalization, will ensure better customer experiences, which is expected to boost customer satisfaction and sales.

testimonial.quote: Sitecore’s advanced digital experience platform underpins our commitment to growing our online capabilities, elevating the customer experience, and maximizing operational efficiency. With a modern technology stack and advanced capabilities such as AI‑powered personalization, we’ll be well‑positioned to support customer‑centric growth.
testimonial.author_title: Chief Marketing & Chief Supply Chain Officer

case_studies.title: Synapxe increases returning site visitors by 150%
case_studies.overview: Sitecore DXP helps Singapore’s national health tech agency boost return traffic.
case_studies.project_brief: Synapxe chose Sitecore as the foundation for its new and rebranded web portal, implemented by Sitecore Silver and Gold Partner Espire Infolabs. Within six months of going live, the new Sitecore-based Synapxe portal has achieved better data management, significant improvement in audience engagement and the attraction of new audiences, and a faster time to market.

challenge.headline: Healthcare transformation
challenge.text: As Singapore’s national healthtech agency, Synapxe creates and deploys solutions that connect people and systems and accelerates technology innovation to transform healthcare. Synapxe aims to use intelligent technological solutions to revolutionize public healthcare while ensuring scalability, reliability, and cost-effectiveness for future growth. A new Synapxe identity demanded an overhaul of its web portal platform. The existing CMS, for instance, had reached its end-of-life and lacked self-serve capabilities for non-technical users. The critical business need was to develop a modern and intuitive web portal to communicate Synapxe’s national role.

solution.headline: Improved productivity
solution.text: Starting with a greenfield environment, Synapxe, along with Sitecore and its business partner, Espire Infolabs, built a new web portal based on a Sitecore DXP. The solution, which includes Sitecore Managed Cloud and Sitecore Experience Manager integrated with Microsoft Azure, is helping Synapxe increase engagement and build trust by establishing a powerful CMS that simplifies content creation and management across channels and devices. Critically, improved audience data and behavior analysis enable Synapxe to deliver more relevant content to visitors, driving better engagement, conversion rates, and loyalty. With the new CMS, Synapxe has improved content management processes to support its rebranded image and deliver relevant audience experiences. Sitecore Experience Editor has significantly improved the efficiency of creating website content, enhancing user engagement and satisfaction. Additional improvements include enhanced security and load balancing.

outcome.headline: Modernized content management
outcome.text: With the help of Sitecore, Synapxe has created a fresh, clean and inviting look and feel and achieved significant performance improvement for its new website. Visitors can now quickly and easily navigate their way to the information they need and instantly see the breadth and scope of digital healthcare services that Synapxe fosters. One example is the new HealthHub web and app service, also powered by Sitecore. With just six months of the new branded site going live, time on the Synapxe site increased by 54%, return traffic by 150% and new visitors by 170%. Sitecore has also helped Synapxe modernize content management, with business users and authors cutting the time to market for new content by 50%. Because they no longer need to use HTML coding and can use pre-designed components, the effort in creating a new page has been cut from a month to less than two weeks. The Sitecore media library consolidates media assets in one place and makes them easy to view and access. By using Sitecore Managed Cloud, Synapxe reduced IT and management costs while improving scalability, availability and performance even during peak demand.

testimonial.quote: With Sitecore XM, our non-technical content owners are now empowered to manage the website components and content on their own, enabling the website to be kept up-to-date with the latest, most relevant and interesting content for our audiences. We have been experiencing an encouraging increase in the number of returning visitors and the duration that visitors are spending on Synapxe’s corporate website in the span of a few months.

case_studies.title: Aer Lingus improved conversions by 1675 percent with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Aer Lingus partnered with Sitecore and Acxiom to enhance its existing DXP by integrating Sitecore CDP, Sitecore Connect, and Sitecore Personalize, leading to significant improvements in digital check-ins, homepage destination promotion conversion, and marketing ROI, fostering a data-driven mindset.
case_studies.project_brief: Aer Lingus partnered with Sitecore and Acxiom to enhance its existing DXP by integrating Sitecore CDP, Sitecore Connect, and Sitecore Personalize, leveraging customer data to provide personalized offers, real-time alerts, and tailored experiences throughout the customer journey.

stats.label: Increase in digital check-ins via homepage
Increase in homepage destination promotion conversion

challenge.headline: Enhancing digital experiences and leveraging customer data effectively
challenge.text: Aer Lingus aimed to enhance its digital experience by leveraging customer data more effectively to provide personalized offers, real-time alerts, and tailored experiences throughout the customer journey.

solution.headline: Integrated DXP with Sitecore CDP, Connect, and Personalize
solution.text: Aer Lingus partnered with Sitecore and Acxiom to enhance its existing DXP by integrating Sitecore CDP, Sitecore Connect, and Sitecore Personalize to provide personalized offers, real-time alerts, and tailored experiences.

outcome.headline: Significant conversion improvements and data-driven mindset
outcome.text: Aer Lingus achieved significant improvements including a 2.5% increase in digital check-ins, a 150% increase in homepage destination promotion conversion, and an 800% marketing ROI during the proof of concept. The project also led to a 16% reduction in homepage exit rates and a 1% point increase in 'Manage Trip' volumes, fostering a data-driven mindset within the business.

testimonial.quote: This project was all about learning new ways of engaging customers via data driven insights and improving their travel experience. Whether signposting customers towards digital check-in, helping customers redeem their reward points, or making connecting journeys easier, the value has been impressive.

case_studies.title: CTAMB improves online experiences for educators with Sitecore XM Cloud
case_studies.overview: Transitioning to Sitecore’s composable CMS and AI‑powered search solutions boosts performance for 300,000+ CTA members by more than 60%.
case_studies.project_brief: ...the organization elected to migrate to a composable digital experience platform built on Sitecore XM Cloud and Sitecore Search. The new site offers enhanced user experiences and AI‑assisted search...

challenge.headline: Providing intuitive member experiences
challenge.text: The site needed to offer intuitive experiences so they could easily find the help they need.

solution.headline: Migrating to Sitecore’s cloud‑native, composable platform
solution.text: CTAMB migrated to a headless, composable approach using Sitecore XM Cloud and AI‑based Sitecore Search, rebuilt by Oshyn. The new site uses Next.js, React, Azure B2C for member access, MS Dynamics CRM for member communications...

outcome.headline: Faster performance and improved search boosts user experiences
outcome.text: The new platform delivers 67% faster response times, 40% higher mobile and 45% higher desktop PageSpeed scores, improved SEO, seamless AI‑powered search, lower maintenance costs, and greater agility...

testimonial.quote: “With faster performance and optimized content, we are providing better online experiences for our educator members, and easier access to the tools and resources they need to enhance their careers and their lives.”
testimonial.author_title: Manager, Member Benefits and Risk Management

case_studies.title: VELUX transforms digital customer engagement with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Composable platform helps global window specialist deliver consistent, feature-rich digital experiences across 190 consumer, digital, and intranet sites.
case_studies.project_brief: To develop new digital touchpoints for customers and improve omnichannel experiences, VELUX decided to unify content and digital asset management using composable Sitecore solutions. The updated platform has improved digital customer engagement with rich new website features and better performance, while enabling faster updates.

stats.label: Faster and easier to publish rich media content on websites
More efficient with automated web editing processes, faster site performance
Reusable components for consistent content creation

challenge.headline: Developing new ways to engage with customers
challenge.text: With customers everywhere now expecting brands to meet them wherever they want to do business, VELUX wants to be proactive in developing new ways to interact with its customers, provide personalized, visual, feature-rich experiences, and ensure the customer journey is consistent and seamless. Recognizing that a consolidated platform would improve the user experience for its 15 million annual visitors, simplify website management, and empower marketing and communication teams to be able to launch new content and updates faster, VELUX decided to bring together its previously disparate content and digital asset management systems.

solution.headline: Composable foundations for 190 consumer, dealer, and intranet sites
solution.text: VELUX partnered with Avanade/Accenture to upgrade to a Sitecore-powered, headless, composable solution, including Sitecore Content Hub DAM with out-of-the-box integration to Sitecore Experience Manager (XM) using the Sitecore Connector. The unified digital platform supports 190-plus websites across 38 countries and 27 production units, including intranet and dealer sites. The new solution seamlessly integrates with the company’s PIM system to ensure the integrity of product information, as well as other applications including its video streaming platform, Salesforce Experience Cloud for partner connections, SAP for enterprise resource planning and customer relationship management, and payment systems for PayPal and credit card providers. In addition to updating its customer-facing sites, VELUX has created a B2B platform on Sitecore so dealers and installers can easily view and access its products, and a customized intranet site that automatically manages prices for each geographical market.

outcome.headline: Better customer experiences and faster time-to-market
outcome.text: By moving to a composable approach powered by Sitecore, VELUX has transformed customer engagement. New website features include the ability to showcase products with compatible models, accessories, and specifications, centralized pricing updates, map integration, and greater location accuracy. Leveraging Sitecore Forms, VELUX manages around 70,000 online after-sales requests via its site annually. With Sitecore enabling a single source of truth for digital assets, product catalogs, and 40 reusable website templates, VELUX has also made it easier for marketers and sales associates to customize websites and generate local campaigns and news, with updates requiring 50% less effort. Automated web editing processes and enhanced site performance, including automated renditions and intelligent media components, have also helped VELUX improve efficiency by around 30%. The company has also improved the ways-of-working which lead to improvement in platform performance.

testimonial.quote: Embarking on this composable architecture journey with Sitecore has brought VELUX value from the very first step. The seamless integration between our headless DAM and CMS combined with re-usable templates provide our marketers with the visibility, access, and ease-of-use to drive feature-rich content and engagement across the multi-channel customer journey.
testimonial.author_title: Senior Manager of Web Digital Delivery

case_studies.title: NHP transforms customer engagement with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: By adopting Sitecore’s composable solutions, electrical product manufacturer and distributor NHP enhances personalization, streamlines marketing operations, and delivers seamless customer experiences while boosting business growth.
case_studies.project_brief: With a diverse set of customers, electrical products manufacturer NHP wanted to tailor website content to better meet their needs. By adopting Sitecore’s composable solutions, including Sitecore XM Cloud, Sitecore CDP, and Sitecore Personalize...

challenge.headline: Marketing to a diverse customer base
challenge.text: NHP manufactures and distributes electrical and automation products... NHP needed a solution that would allow its digital marketers to easily update and manage website content without relying on developers for every change.

solution.headline: Personalized online experiences that align with user needs
solution.text: NHP embraced a composable approach with Sitecore... migrating from Sitecore Experience Commerce (XC) to Sitecore XM Cloud for content management, Sitecore CDP to unify customer data, and Sitecore Personalize to deliver tailored content. The company is also transitioning from Sitecore Discover to Sitecore Search... and plans to integrate Sitecore OrderCloud.

outcome.headline: More targeted campaigns boost customer experiences
outcome.text: With Sitecore solutions, NHP is transforming customer experiences and boosting marketing success... With composable, cloud-based solutions, NHP has gained greater agility, while freeing up time previously spent on upgrades and maintenance.

stats.label: Increase in ecommerce revenues in last financial year

testimonial.quote: By leveraging Sitecore’s composable solutions, we’re creating personalized, frictionless experiences that boost customer satisfaction and business growth, while increasing operational efficiency.

case_studies.title: United Airlines delivers personalized travel experiences with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Timely messaging and language personalization praised by English and Spanish speaking customers for making critical travel information more accessible.
case_studies.project_brief: To make critical travel information accessible to all, United Airlines provides translated and personalized boarding information for Spanish‑speaking customers with the help of Sitecore.

challenge.headline: Enhancing the customer experience
challenge.text: The challenge was delivering variable, personalized content to thousands of digital signs across airports worldwide, enabling United Airlines to give its passengers the most advanced airport gate and end‑to‑end travel experience.

solution.headline: Single source of truth
solution.text: ...migrated its existing Sitecore DXP solution to a composable and headless cloud environment incorporating Sitecore XM Cloud, Sitecore CDP, and Sitecore Personalize, delivered through Vercel.

outcome.headline: Resounding customer approval
outcome.text: Improvements delivered on Sitecore’s composable DXP, such as enhanced personalization and multilingual support, have received resounding approval from United Airlines customers.

stats.label: CMS’ consolidated onto one Sitecore platform
Passengers interact with digital signage per year

testimonial.quote: Using Sitecore’s composable technology has helped United Airlines improve the quality, content, and efficiency of information delivered to millions of customers with better gate, self‑service, and boarding experiences.

case_studies.title: Acrisure boosts direct‑to‑consumer business with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Leading insurer supports expansion into direct‑to‑consumer market with unified, flexible, and scalable digital experience platform built on Sitecore.
case_studies.project_brief: Acrisure is a leading global fintech... needed a CMS that could support Acrisure’s technology strategy for building a best‑in‑class Digital Marketplace. To accomplish this... Acrisure’s migration from its legacy platform to Sitecore XM Cloud...

challenge.headline: Driving the direct‑to‑consumer strategy
challenge.text: Acrisure recognized that to engage effectively with consumers, it must offer seamless and personalized digital experiences. Acrisure needed a platform to integrate its internal AI capabilities and streamline content creation to deliver relevant, contextual, and personalized experiences that deepen user engagement.

solution.headline: Scalable and flexible digital foundations
solution.text: Acrisure built its new consumer‑focused website on Sitecore XM Cloud, leveraging Sitecore’s composable, dynamic, and scalable architecture. By also integrating Sitecore Personalize... Sitecore’s modern experience platform also seamlessly integrates with Acrisure’s other digital models and AI technologies, including its Google Cloud Platform...

outcome.headline: Seamless consumer and user engagement
outcome.text: Launched in just four months, Acrisure's new website brings its engagement strategy to life with a compelling brand story, seamless user experiences, and personalized customer journeys.

testimonial.quote: Sitecore's advanced digital experience capabilities showcase Acrisure’s fintech innovations and are expanding our abilities to provide personalized user experiences that deliver the products and solutions that serve the holistic needs of our clients.

case_studies.title: Sitecore helps General Assembly revolutionize online education experience to boost site performance
case_studies.overview: Global upskilling, reskilling and talent provider uses Sitecore XM Cloud to drive 3x more visitor-to-lead conversions.
case_studies.project_brief: General Assembly is a global organization delivering advanced technology learning... Building upon that success, General Assembly has migrated to a composable Sitecore XM Cloud platform...

challenge.headline: Meeting learner needs
challenge.text: With a global presence, GA needed to better meet the needs of its learners, company partners, and employees. This required an updated technology stack and a refreshed UX...

solution.headline: Modern composable DXP
solution.text: ...built a modern, composable digital experience platform using Sitecore XM Cloud... Sitecore XM Cloud integrates with Vercel as the front‑end host and connects with General Assembly’s existing DAM, Bynder, and Google Analytics applications. A key Sitecore integration is GA’s Salesforce CRM...

outcome.headline: Sustainable, scalable future growth
outcome.text: With the Sitecore‑powered modern SaaS‑based composable DXP in place, General Assembly has enhanced user experiences, improved operational efficiency, and positioned itself for sustainable, scalable future growth.

stats.label: Increase in paid search click-to-lead conversions

testimonial.quote: The move to Sitecore and the related UX updates have vastly improved our ability to be agile and flexible to meet the needs of our business and our customers.

case_studies.title: Atkore delivers connected customer experiences with Sitecore XM Cloud
case_studies.overview: US manufacturer transforms online experiences with a composable solution for centralized content management, seamless digital asset management, and future‑proof headless commerce.
case_studies.project_brief: To deliver a more consistent and connected online experience, the company consolidated 27 brand websites into one using a composable Sitecore XM Cloud and Content Hub implementation.

stats.label: Pages now load within one second

challenge.headline: Bringing together disparate brands and websites
challenge.text: Atkore had more than 27 brands, each of which had its own website, tech stacks and vendors—creating silos and inconsistent customer experiences. The company needed a unified, cloud‑first platform to consolidate operations and drive digital efficiency.

solution.headline: A unified, composable approach
solution.text: In partnership with Sitecore, Atkore implemented XM Cloud for centralized content management and Content Hub DAM for asset and product content integration. They also began using OrderCloud to add headless commerce functionality in phase two.

outcome.headline: A connected, efficient platform
outcome.text: Atkore consolidated 27 sites into one, achieved 5× faster performance vs legacy systems, reduced content deployment times to five minutes, and 90% of pages now load in under one second.

testimonial.quote: “With composable digital foundations built on Sitecore XM Cloud, Content Hub DAM, and OrderCloud, we’ve been able to consolidate our brands, products, and resources in a connected web platform that delivers better online experiences for our customers.”

case_studies.title: BDR Thermea boosts productivity eight‑fold with composable Sitecore solutions
case_studies.overview: Composable Sitecore solutions increase digital efficiency and business agility for BDR Thermea Group.
case_studies.project_brief: As part of its shift toward energy‑transition-focused digital strategy, BDR Thermea adopted a composable Sitecore approach to centralize digital operations and future‑proof its web estate.

stats.label: Improvement in mobile page load speeds

challenge.headline: Supporting the energy transition
challenge.text: With 20 brands and heavily customized legacy sites, BDR Thermea needed a more agile and flexible web platform to support its transition to energy‑efficient HVAC solutions and shift from B2B2C to B2B partner models.

solution.headline: Centralizing websites with a composable approach
solution.text: In partnership with Avanade and Accenture Song, BDR Thermea deployed Sitecore XM Cloud and OrderCloud... laying the foundation for future personalization, e‑commerce, and generative AI.

outcome.headline: Maximizing productivity and performance
outcome.text: The composable platform led to a 790% increase in productivity, 50% boost in back‑office performance, €500k annual savings, 390% faster mobile speeds, and a 43% rise in new site visits.

testimonial.quote: "The first benefits we've seen with using XM Cloud are around the speed – an update that used to take a day now takes just an hour. This eight‑fold increase in efficiency will help us pivot the business as we support the energy transition."
testimonial.author_title: Marketing Manager, Product Owner & Digital Strategy Lead

case_studies.title: ONEOK boosts digital agility and user experiences with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: ONEOK, a leading energy infrastructure company, migrated to a composable Sitecore XM Cloud and Search platform, improving site performance, user experience, and content management efficiency.
case_studies.project_brief: The result was a migration to a composable, future-proof architecture built on Sitecore XM Cloud and Sitecore Search, enabling improved site performance, user experience, and faster content deployment.

challenge.headline: Support acquisition integration
challenge.text: Legacy, unsupported technologies led to high infrastructure costs, long deployment times, and poor content agility.

solution.headline: A seamless migration to a future‑proof web environment
solution.text: In partnership with Perficient, ONEOK migrated from Sitecore XP to XM Cloud and added Sitecore Search, redesigned the main landing page... and built the site on Next.js hosted via Vercel, with Telerik React components for data visualization.

outcome.headline: Greater agility with faster website updates
outcome.text: The new platform delivers improved user experience and site performance (Lighthouse in the upper 90s), faster content publishing, reduced infrastructure costs, and increased marketing productivity and compliance efficiency.

testimonial.quote: Site performance has improved significantly since we completed the rebuild and migration to Sitecore XM Cloud. XM Cloud’s new authoring experience and tools provide more agility to the content team...

case_studies.title: Manufacturer cuts digital marketing cost by 15% over 5 years with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Belgian manufacturer cuts digital marketing and cloud project costs by 15% over five years by migrating to Sitecore XM Cloud and Sitecore360.
case_studies.project_brief: The business is constantly innovating and refreshing content for 12 branded websites built and managed on Sitecore XM Cloud... the work to present beautiful images and content in multiple languages and conduct detailed customer experience analysis is done entirely by the in‑house team...

stats.label: Cut in cloud & web project costs
Improvement in digital tech learning time
Time to launch multilingual Asian site

challenge.headline: Marketing textiles digitally
challenge.text: To reduce costs, retain control and exercise consistency Bru wanted to bring all digital activity in‑house. But with a small team and a large and complex digital footprint that was challenging.

solution.headline: Maximizing the value of cloud
solution.text: Bru shifted its Sitecore platform to the cloud by upgrading to Sitecore XM Cloud... They engaged Sitecore360 for expert workshops, training, and cloud‑migration guidance. This reduced learning time by 30% and enabled advanced capabilities like visual authoring, personalization, and analytics.

outcome.headline: Shortening time to market
outcome.text: With Sitecore XM Cloud and Sitecore360, Bru’s in‑house team now manages and customizes the platform independently. They launched the Acacia Fabrics multilingual site in just three weeks, estimate 20% cost savings on cloud and web projects, and achieved 15% digital marketing cost reductions over five years.

testimonial.quote: By migrating from Sitecore on‑premises to Sitecore XM Cloud with Sitecore360, Bru Textiles is maintaining our high‑quality digital marketing project standards, as well as optimized our team’s web development capabilities and ensured a seamless cloud implementation.

case_studies.title: Norwegian bank drives up productivity by 80% with Sitecore XM Cloud
case_studies.overview: Sparebanken Vest improved digital and self‑service banking experiences using Sitecore XM Cloud’s flexible, scalable platform, boosting efficiency and customer satisfaction.
case_studies.project_brief: Sparebanken Vest... migrated its DXP from Sitecore XP to XM Cloud to modernize its digital services ecosystem... The move supported greater agility for cloud and SaaS‑based banking applications.

challenge.headline: Driving up digital engagement
challenge.text: Its legacy Sitecore XP site was complex, costly to manage, and lacked agility to deliver new digital services efficiently.

solution.headline: Seamless migration to a composable SaaS DXP
solution.text: In partnership with Sitecore, their IT team migrated their digital experience platform from XP to Sitecore XM Cloud SaaS, introducing composable architecture, modern development workflows, and scalable infrastructure...

outcome.headline: Enhanced efficiency and customer satisfaction
outcome.text: Post‑migration, Sparebanken Vest saw an 80% boost in operational efficiency... and improved search rankings and Net Promoter Scores.

testimonial.quote: “Sitecore XM Cloud gives Sparebanken Vest a modern, flexible, and scalable platform to deliver digital and customer self‑serve banking applications and services.”

case_studies.title: HealthHub improves visitor time on site with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Singapore's national healthtech platform, HealthHub, powered by Synapxe, improved digital content discovery and user experience, increasing visitor time on site and search engine traffic, by adopting Sitecore's modern, scalable Digital Experience Platform (DXP).
case_studies.project_brief: HealthHub, Singapore's national healthtech platform powered by Synapxe, migrated to the Sitecore DXP, including Sitecore Content Hub DAM, Sitecore Content Hub Operations, Sitecore Managed Cloud, and Sitecore Experience Platform (XP), to deliver more relevant and personalized health content, streamline content creation, and facilitate seamless content sharing.

challenge.headline: Legacy CMS hindering personalization and scalability
challenge.text: HealthHub's legacy content management system presented opportunities for improvement in information architecture. The Synapxe HealthHub team sought a modern, scalable, secure, and flexible Digital Experience Platform (DXP) to meet the needs of content creators and deliver personalized experiences to residents at scale.

solution.headline: Migration to Sitecore DXP for personalized content and streamlined operations
solution.text: HealthHub, in collaboration with Sitecore and VML Singapore, migrated to the Sitecore DXP, implementing Sitecore Content Hub DAM, Sitecore Content Hub Operations, Sitecore Managed Cloud, and Sitecore Experience Platform (XP). This enabled personalized health content delivery, streamlined content creation and publishing, and seamless content sharing. Integration of data analytics and SEO intelligence tools further optimized customer journeys.

outcome.headline: Improved user engagement and content discoverability
outcome.text: Since deploying the Sitecore DXP, HealthHub has seen residents spending up to 16% more time on the website and search engine traffic increasing by 75%. These results indicate improved content discoverability and public traction, enhancing just-in-time content discovery.

testimonial.quote: HealthHub leverages Sitecore to elevate health content discovery and improve citizens' digital health literacy, aiming to become the digital partner of choice for residents on their health journey by fusing data and content for personalized, omnichannel experiences.

case_studies.title: Joyce Meyer Ministries accelerates innovation with headless commerce
case_studies.overview: Non-profit
case_studies.project_brief: Joyce Meyer Ministries (JMM), a leading provider of religious and motivational resources, recognized the need to modernize its ecommerce platform to better serve its growing and diverse customer base. They struggled with their legacy ecommerce system, which created limitations around customization, slow performance, outdated search functionality, and a lack of scalability. To address these challenges, JMM migrated to OrderCloud, a headless commerce solution they knew would provide greater flexibility to meet their diverse business needs, deliver improved performance, enhance search capabilities, and enable future growth.

stats.label: Reduction in page response time - from 1.5 seconds average to below 500ms
Improvement in time to release new product content and catalog features

challenge.headline: Outdated ecommerce platform blocking growth
challenge.text: JMM, a leading faith-based organization, offers an extensive range of products and services, including donations, books, teachings, and exclusive bundles for millions of supporters. JMM faced significant challenges with their traditional ecommerce platform. The rigid system hindered UI customization and innovation, limiting the ability to meet customer expectations. Outdated search functionality made it hard for users to find relevant products, negatively impacting sales. Additionally, slow loading times caused by heavy content, large catalogs, and complex inventory management led to poor user experiences, higher bounce rates, and lower conversions. To support future growth, JMM required a scalable, flexible platform that could adapt to evolving business needs.

solution.headline: Gaining flexibility and scalability with headless commerce
solution.text: JMM adopted OrderCloud, an API-first, headless commerce platform, which provided the flexibility, scalability, and performance improvements needed to modernize their ecommerce operations. This flexible platform enabled the team to quickly and easily customize the user interface, and deliver tailored shopping experiences. Additionaly, the team was able to build their own internal administrative interface for JMM marketers and business users to easily manage products, coupons, promotions, offers and more, making the whole team’s job easier. OrderCloud helped to optimize page load speeds through better content delivery, image optimization, and caching strategies, improving the user experience, reducing bounce rates and boosting overall site engagement. Also, a new advanced search feature that combined content and product data was implemented, allowing customers to easily find products through personalized search results and relevant product recommendations.

outcome.headline: Achieving their goals within the first week
outcome.text: The shift to OrderCloud delivered significant improvements for JMM. Website performance soared with a 99% Lighthouse score indicating faster load times and a smoother user experience. The headless architecture allowed for a complete overhaul of the UI/UX, creating a modern, user-friendly design that better aligned with the company’s business needs and improved the customer experience, while the new search functionality provided more relevant, personalized product recommendations, improving overall conversion rates. Transitioning to a composable architecture has also streamlined feature development, simplified content and catalog management, and cut content release times from nearly an hour to just 7 minutes. Managing global ecommerce products and pricing with multiple currency types, inventory counts, catalogs and more has also been streamlined. The platform’s flexibility and scalability allows JMM to seamlessly intregrate third-party services and new tools with low-code changes, adapting to new business needs. Sitecore has opened the door for future enhancements, including personalization, automation, positioning JMM for continued growth and success.

testimonial.quote: The joint effort with the Sitecore team from the beginning of the project through go live made it go smoothly. Our metrics within the first week were meeting all of our goals. We now have a very fast and modern-looking web/app presence that will allow us to continue to deliver our message to share Christ and help people around the world for the foreseeable future.

case_studies.title: Global manufacturer increases marketing productivity with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Composable solution from Sitecore helps electronics and automation manufacturer WAGO automate 150+ annual marketing campaigns for estimated 15% faster delivery.
case_studies.project_brief: By introducing a centralized single source of truth, WAGO has driven up overall productivity and improved content delivery, including speeding time-to-market for more than 150 marketing campaigns per year by approximately 15%.

challenge.headline: Smarter content management
challenge.text: With teams and systems technically disconnected, WAGO’s marketers struggled to manage content and campaigns across siloed systems, causing inefficiencies and errors in digital assets and information.

solution.headline: Centralized, automated content and asset processes
solution.text: Working with partner OMMAX, WAGO deployed Sitecore Content Hub DAM and Content Hub Operations, replacing four systems with one centralized platform managing 30,000 products and over 100,000 digital assets.

outcome.headline: Lean, efficient marketing
outcome.text: By automating 150+ campaigns, WAGO achieved ~15% faster time‑to‑market, improved content quality and collaboration, and operational efficiency via a centralized source of truth.

testimonial.quote: “Sitecore's solution has automated the management of our increasing volume of content and assets as the company continues to grow, improving operational efficiency, and strengthening team collaboration. We now have a clear view of all the various campaigns and topics that we design, engineer, and deploy—in Content Hub.”

case_studies.title: Beyond Blue drives up engagement by 50% with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Australian mental health not-for-profit boosts engagement, mobile access, site performance, and new inquiries through a modern Sitecore XM Cloud experience.

stats.label: New inquiries for help and support

case_studies.project_brief: Beyond Blue has developed a modern digital experience platform (DXP) based on Sitecore to expand and improve the use of advanced digital communication facilities...

challenge.headline: Making health care digital
challenge.text: The existing platform had reached its end‑of‑life and was costly and difficult to support and maintain... the platform’s inability to support deployment of new digital channels hindered Beyond Blue’s strategy...

solution.headline: A scalable, secure solution
solution.text: In collaboration with Sitecore and Sitecore partner Luminary, Beyond Blue migrated to the cloud‑based Sitecore DXP for scalability, security, scope for future omnichannel content delivery, and the ability to facilitate a microservices architecture approach... The new digital experience platform offers improved search functionality... personalization and more robust data management.

outcome.headline: Driving up engagement
outcome.text: The Sitecore digital experience platform has seen a significant uplift in engagement from people seeking help from Beyond Blue. The Wellbeing Action Tool, a self‑help guide and template, has seen engagement increase by 50%.

testimonial.quote: "Clear alignment around the objectives of the project, the deep emotional connection to the work that Beyond Blue does... it looked a little tenuous, but we’ve got this, and everyone did."

case_studies.title: Consultancy drives up customer engagement and revenue opportunities with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: A Forbes best American consultancy, Point B is disrupting the market with a Sitecore DXP that improves content access and personalization by 100%.
case_studies.project_brief: Point B... is challenging larger, established firms with a Sitecore DXP that is increasing brand awareness, driving up customer engagement, and fostering lead generation and revenue‑growth opportunities.

challenge.headline: A Forbes best consultancy
challenge.text: Point B’s business operations had been stifled by an outdated and custom-built website that was complex to manage... The aim was to communicate and differentiate the Point B brand, build trust with buyers... and increase lead generation.

solution.headline: Headless, composable SaaS DXP
solution.text: ...developed a headless, composable SaaS digital experience platform (DXP) built on Sitecore XM Cloud... Point B's DXP also includes Sitecore Search for scalable, multi‑purpose search, Sitecore CDP for customer profile tracking and analytics, and Sitecore Personalize to enable targeted experiences. Integrations included Vercel Next.js... and Salesforce Pardot Forms.

outcome.headline: 212% more customer engagement
outcome.text: Now in a stronger position to challenge the established consultancy industry, Point B’s marketing and customer communication is more flexible, and the company can better reflect business changes rapidly and respond to customer demand swiftly.

testimonial.quote: Having the best‑in‑class Sitecore DXP platform along with best‑in‑class development by Sitecore partner Oshyn, helps Point B increase brand awareness and authenticity...

case_studies.title: Construction and services leader boosts web team productivity
case_studies.overview: CIMIC Group transforms online user experiences and enables 240% faster content creation with Sitecore XM Cloud and AI‑powered Search.

stats.label: Month‑to‑month increase in new site visits
Faster for users to find content

case_studies.project_brief: The transformation project, which involved upgrading from Sitecore XP to Sitecore XM Cloud and Sitecore Search, was delivered six months early.

challenge.headline: Establishing scalable digital foundations
challenge.text: The group was supporting these websites on a traditional infrastructure running Sitecore XP. The infrastructure lacked scalability... Due to technical debt, CIMIC Group struggled to update its systems to the latest versions, which resulted in security risks, increased maintenance costs, and downtime.

solution.headline: A pioneering approach to future‑proofing 13 websites
solution.text: CIMIC Group migrated from Sitecore XP to Sitecore XM Cloud for its user‑friendly content authoring experience and added Sitecore Search... Other key factors for selecting the cloud‑based Sitecore solutions include the composable approach and compatibility with AI and machine learning to support future initiatives.

outcome.headline: Improved marketing productivity and an exceptional user experience
outcome.text: CIMIC Group improved the user experience, enhanced marketing productivity, and enabled greater scalability. The platform delivers quicker loading times and better responsiveness, with 33% faster search.

testimonial.quote: The decision to rebuild our website has proved to be a very good one. We achieved a pioneering digital transformation and launched six months early. We are proud of the team's cross‑company collaboration and committed to staying at the forefront of digital innovation.

case_studies.title: Australia's Gold Coast drives 100%+ higher tourist engagement with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Run-up to 2032 Summer Olympics drives digital transformation with Sitecore composable solutions delivering triple digit increases in conversions, new business opportunities
case_studies.project_brief: Experience Gold Coast (EGC), the region’s destination marketing organization, is reinvigorating its visitor digital journey in anticipation of the 2032 Summer Olympics. By using Sitecore composable solutions, EGC has achieved faster and easier visitor engagement management and personalization, resulting in double- and triple-digit increases in website visits, conversions, and business opportunities.

challenge.headline: Raising tourist engagement over increasing competition
challenge.text: The Gold Coast’s tourism industry, attracting 11 million tourists a year and generating AU$7 billion, faced increasing competition reducing its market share. Experience Gold Coast (EGC) needed to increase demand, arrivals, and expenditures for the region’s accommodation and entertainment venues, theme parks, tour operators, restaurants, and professional support services. Aiming to double economic impact in 10 years, EGC’s strategy focused on appealing to wider audiences and converting interest into bookings and revenue. EGC wanted to offer a visitor-focused digital experience and empower marketers to maximize dynamic content, segmentation, and personalization.

solution.headline: Expand digital engagement with modern, future-proof DX
solution.text: EGC worked with Sitecore solution partner PING Works to develop a modern, flexible, future-proof digital experience platform integrating Sitecore’s composable solutions with third-party data warehouses, applications, aggregators, and services on the Sitecore Experience Platform. Sitecore CDP and Sitecore Personalize are used for analyzing customer data and delivering personalized content and offers to broader visitor segments. Sitecore Content Hub DAM enables non-technical marketing and sales professionals to develop, manage, and publish digital content, driving a 174% increase in goal completions. EGC can standardize various asset types from diverse sources for distribution to members, press, government, and tourism entities.

outcome.headline: Engaging new visitors
outcome.text: EGC’s new website is broadening audiences and increasing tourism to the city. With the composable Sitecore platform, EGC is transforming the organization’s visitor engagement, driving up visitor numbers, and increasing the city’s economic performance. Website traffic is up by 48.5%, and visitors are spending 17% more time per session, benefiting local businesses with increased customers and revenue. Revenue-generating opportunities increased 164% year-on-year, with a 119% increase in visitors booking accommodations, attending leisure and business events, and enjoying local establishments. Significantly, a 52.5% increase in new site visits indicates that EGC is reaching audiences that are new to the Gold Coast—and raising the destination’s global profile in the run-up to the 2032 Summer Olympics.

testimonial.quote: EGC transformed the impact of our digital platform by seamlessly integrating several Sitecore composable products with associated applications to deliver a flexible and future-proof solution. With Sitecore, we have made it easy for non-technical business users to create and manage content and develop targeted and personalized digital journeys so we can reach and attract new audiences to the Gold Coast.

case_studies.title: Global manufacturing leader transforms customer experience with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Brady Corp DXP centralizes content and operations for 18 multilingual websites across 23 countries worldwide
case_studies.project_brief: Brady Corporation has over a century of experience and is a global leader providing essential safety, identification, and compliance solutions tailored to businesses of all sizes, across every corner of the globe. From the depths of the ocean to outer space, from the factory floor to the delivery room, Brady’s comprehensive range of high-quality products, including labels, printers, RFID technologies, and barcode scanning solutions, are just about everywhere you look. Thanks to a modern, flexible, and efficient digital experience platform powered by Sitecore, Brady’s products and solutions reach businesses and organizations in nearly every country, and has significantly enhanced how customers search, select, and purchase products.

challenge.headline: Embracing a global market
challenge.text: Headquartered in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, Brady Corporation has been manufacturing and marketing a vast array of safety, identification, and software products since 1914. With a broad market reach, Brady serves a diverse customer base across industries such as electronics, telecommunications, manufacturing, electrical, construction, medical, and aerospace. As customer expectations evolve and competition intensifies, Brady recognized the opportunity to enhance its already strong ecommerce platform with a more modern, flexible, and innovative approach. With nearly 6,000 employees operating in many countries worldwide, Brady is focused on implementing scalable solutions that not only meet the demands of today, but also position the company to effectively reach and engage new audiences in the future.

solution.headline: Composable, headless architecture
solution.text: Brady has built a new ecommerce platform powered by a Sitecore digital experience platform incorporating Sitecore OrderCloud, Sitecore Personalize, Sitecore Discover, and Sitecore Experience Manager. Working with Sitecore and its business partner Americaneagle.com, Brady has implemented a centralized DXP that integrates with the company’s SAP ERP system. Underscoring Brady’s composable and headless approach to technology architecture, Sitecore OrderCloud's API-first approach helps Brady build custom extensions and integrations with enterprise and third-party systems and scale new content and experiences to meet global demands. Separating business logic from the front end enhances flexibility to create optimized user interfaces, and scalability that enables the use of ecommerce functionality through other front-end channels, as well as team productivity. Additionally, using Sitecore OrderCloud to streamline product data structure has modularized Brady’s ecommerce platform for better performance and customer experience.

outcome.headline: Driving efficiency and effectiveness
outcome.text: By centralizing ecommerce operations, simplifying order management, and eliminating the need for multiple application instances, Brady has greatly improved productivity and operational efficiency. Additionally, this transformation is driving a notable increase in both new and existing customers. A key advantage of the cloud-based Sitecore solution is reducing the time spent on application maintenance and updates. With some of these tasks handled automatically, Brady can now dedicate their efforts to delivering high-quality content and exceptional customer experiences, rather than focusing on IT operations and application support. This strategic shift has empowered Brady to elevate its digital presence and reinforce its position as a global leader.

testimonial.quote: At Brady, we’re always striving to be better — innovating and building new products, exploring better ways to solve our customers' problems, and delivering exceptional experiences at each touchpoint. An essential part of enhancing our customer connections is our new Sitecore-powered DXP. Sitecore’s tools have given us great flexibility, enabling us to elevate our ecommerce experience and empower our customers to be more effective and successful.

case_studies.title: NTUC creates digital experiences 500 percent faster with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Singapore's National Trades Union Congress (NTUC) consolidated 62 websites onto Sitecore XP and Content Hub DAM, enabling 500% faster website deployments, enhancing user experience, boosting new online membership sign-ups and website traffic, and improving content management efficiency.
case_studies.project_brief: NTUC faced the challenge of unifying 62 websites, including those for trade unions, associations, and social enterprises, onto a single, future-proof platform. They migrated to Sitecore XP for its multi-tenancy capabilities and deployed Sitecore Content Hub DAM for centralized digital asset management. This transformation aimed to improve user experience, simplify website management, and enhance user management and security.

challenge.headline: Uniting 62 disparate websites on end-of-life technologies
challenge.text: NTUC's existing website technologies were reaching end-of-life, and they needed to unite 62 websites, including those for 58 trade unions, seven trade associations, and seven social enterprises, onto a single, future-proof platform. Key considerations included improving user experience, simplifying website management, and enhancing user management and security, ensuring that individual union web teams could only access their own sites.

solution.headline: Sitecore XP and Content Hub for multi-tenancy and centralized asset management
solution.text: NTUC, led by Siow Shong Seng, migrated all 62 websites to Sitecore XP for its multi-tenancy capabilities and deployed Sitecore Content Hub DAM for centralized digital asset management. These Sitecore solutions were integrated with NTUC's existing systems like Linkpass (membership), Coveo (search), and OKTA (identity and access management). Reusable component libraries and streamlined workflows enabled efficient content management without IT support.

outcome.headline: Faster deployments, improved user experience, and increased member engagement
outcome.text: NTUC now deploys new websites and content five times faster, leading to 500% faster website deployments. The transformed user experience resulted in over 39,000 new online membership sign-ups and a 33% increase in website traffic. NTUC leverages Sitecore's analytics to understand user behavior and transactions better, allowing rapid changes to improve online engagement and member services. The platform also supports future enhancements like personalization and A/B testing.

testimonial.quote: Choosing the right platform and partners is the foundation of offering a state-of-the-art digital experience. With Sitecore we can flex and scale with growing needs.
testimonial.author_title: Chief Transformation & Technology Officer, Transformation Office

case_studies.title: Omnichannel retailer extends premium in‑store experience online with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: The Tile Shop decreases page load time by 5x, cuts development time by up to 50%, and expands ecommerce experience.
case_studies.project_brief: The company has launched a new omnichannel in‑store and online experience, powered by Sitecore. Customers can browse through 5,000 different tile designs... enabling homeowners the luxury of making creative and personalized décor choices fast, efficient, and stress free.

challenge.headline: Closing the customer experience gap
challenge.text: The challenge was extending the in‑store experience to the web, enabling omnichannel marketing, and growing an ecommerce business.

solution.headline: Headless, composable ecommerce
solution.text: ...migrated from Sitecore XP to a newly developed headless, composable ecommerce architecture using Sitecore XM Cloud, Sitecore OrderCloud and Sitecore Discover.

outcome.headline: Increasing market share
outcome.text: Sitecore has delivered a modernized ecommerce platform for faster time to market and increased scalability and has enabled commerce anywhere by providing an omnichannel customer experience which is helping The Tile Shop increase market share.

stats.label: Faster to deploy content and experiences

testimonial.quote: In retail it is change or die, so as a business we need to be agile and be able to pivot quickly. The Sitecore platform and the knowledge and experience that the partnership brings to The Tile Shop enables us to be much better prepared for future challenges.

case_studies.title: Global tech firm drives 200% more website sales with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Avanade's digital transformation improves sales and customer engagement with website leads increasing by 100% and 560% more leads turning into opportunities.
case_studies.project_brief: When Sitecore partner Avanade embarked upon its website rebuild using a Sitecore XM Cloud solution, little could they have imagined that in just five months, it would transform business performance with a 200% increase in web-based sales...

challenge.headline: Changing customer demand
challenge.text: Avanade is the world’s leading expert on Microsoft... The business had seen a dramatic change in client demand and expectation for better, faster, agile, and personalized digital experiences.

solution.headline: Modern, faster, connected
solution.text: Avanade migrated from on‑premises to a Sitecore Content Cloud solution comprising Sitecore XM Cloud and Sitecore Content Hub DAM. Sitecore integrates with the company’s martech stack to enable an end‑to‑end client experience journey... connected to Marketo for organizing marketing automation and Microsoft Dynamics as the CRM platform.

outcome.headline: Better sales, better engagement
outcome.text: As a result of Sitecore, a fresher looking website, rebrand and other improvements, Avanade has realized better engagement, better sales, and better experiences.

testimonial.quote: Our Sitecore‑powered website is the critical point for every single moment that matters in our client journey. And collectively, it's helping Avanade be a simpler organization to understand and an easier organization to work with and that is translating into great ROI figures.

case_studies.title: Toyota Australia makes car buying easy with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Toyota Australia deployed a modern DXP for consumers to find used cars from home.
case_studies.project_brief: Buying a car is the second biggest purchase we are likely to make (after buying a home). But with the average cost of a new car costing around $62,000AUD, most of us opt for a more affordable second-hand vehicle. Toyota Australia is helping to make the experience of researching, finding, and choosing the right car easier and more palatable. The company’s reimagined used car website, powered by Sitecore technology, enables people to do most of the legwork from the comfort of their own homes.

challenge.headline: Car purchase pain
challenge.text: Finding your next car can be a time-consuming and emotionally draining process, especially when navigating through a wide range of makes and models across multiple dealerships. Toyota Australia has reimagined this journey with the launch of the new Used Vehicle Reimagined website, designed to make buying a second-hand vehicle easier, faster, and more enjoyable for its customers. With access to around 10,000 vehicles at any time, the platform allows potential buyers to effortlessly search and browse Toyota dealership used vehicle stock from across the country. In addition to this extensive inventory, the site highlights Toyota Certified Pre-Owned Vehicles, offering market-leading benefits like rigorous inspections, extended warranties, and the peace of mind that comes with buying a quality-assured vehicle. By providing a modern digital experience solution, Toyota enables customers to confidently find, explore, and even purchase their ideal vehicle entirely online, making the experience as smooth as possible.

solution.headline: Headless ecommerce platform
solution.text: In collaboration with Sitecore’s implementation partner Deloitte Digital and Toyota's design partner, R/GA. The company transformed its existing Sitecore XP solution to the Sitecore XM Headless and decided to utilize some of Sitecore’s SaaS DXP offerings including Sitecore Search, Sitecore Discover, and Sitecore OrderCloud. The Sitecore OrderCloud headless ecommerce platform has been integrated with the Next.js open-source web development framework to modernize the DXP and better meet customer demand. The modern, headless approach to the new DXP has fostered a modular content and component architecture for Toyota’s digital properties. It enables Toyota to build unique ecommerce, order management, and marketplace solutions and is a foundation to deliver more experiences in the future. Much of the success of the project is down to meticulous planning, coordination, and technical expertise between the Toyota team, Deloitte Digital, and Sitecore.

outcome.headline: Modern digital experience
outcome.text: Sitecore has helped Toyota Australia deliver a digital transformation of its used vehicle services. When looking for their next car, visitors to Toyota Australia’s website get a fast and efficient ecommerce experience. The Sitecore-powered DXP uses AI to ‘learn’ visitor preferences, helping to make searching seamless. Already the new architecture is delivering impressive results with overall website performance significantly faster than before. Key page load times, for example, are 40% quicker and site reliability has increased by 45%. Conversion rates on incoming traffic has increased by 25% since transitioning to the new platform. This gives customers a seamless experience with increased page load efficiencies and better user engagement. The Toyota staff experience has also improved as the time to create and deploy new components and content has been cut by weeks. Part of that has been achieved by increasing content and component re-use by almost 50%. The digital transformation of Toyota Australia's Used Vehicle Program leverages the headless Sitecore platform and Sitecore composable technologies to create a modern digital experience for digitally savvy customers.

testimonial.quote: By leveraging Sitecore’s composable DXP products we have established a new solid foundation to build and deliver exceptional experiences for Toyota customers.

case_studies.title: NMDP unifies and personalizes digital experiences with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Nonprofit provides better online experiences for donors, patients, and caregivers with Sitecore-powered content delivery and personalization.

stats.label: site now for "bone marrow donation" searches
of unique visitors reported service desk incidents in 6 months
reduction of site pages, from 3,237 to 290
uptime since moving to Sitecore with Vercel

challenge.headline: An inconsistent and fragmented digital footprint
challenge.text: NMDP, formerly the National Marrow Donor Program, saves lives by providing cell therapy for individuals battling blood diseases or cancers and connecting potential donors with those that need transplants. With more than nine million potential donors on its registry and around 125,000 transplants facilitated since 1987, NMDP impacts thousands of lives each year. NMDP’s website plays a vital role in changing lives for families across the US. Digital technologies are integral to NMDP’s operations, from maintaining the national registry to coordinating patient care. To provide the highest levels of service to patients, families, caregivers, transplant centers, and research institutions, NMDP relies on enterprise-level digital solutions. As a nonprofit, NMDP must carefully evaluate its investments to ensure they stay within a limited budget while maximizing impact. As part of its rebranding to NMDP, the organization sought to modernize its digital platform and consolidate its various microsites and brands. Its digital footprint included dozens of independently developed websites catering to diverse audiences, such as B2C, B2B, and B2G (business-to-government). This resulted in disparate and outdated technologies, including a CMS that was nearing its end of life and no longer fit for purpose.

solution.headline: Enabling integrated, personalized content delivery with a headless approach
solution.text: NMDP embarked on a multi-year, multi-site initiative to rebuild and rebrand its digital presence. This effort involved replacing outdated platforms with modern, robust headless solutions powered by Sitecore. NMDP selected Sitecore Experience Manager (XM), Sitecore Experience Platform (XP), Sitecore CDP, and Sitecore Personalize as the foundation for its new digital capabilities. “We evaluated many tools before choosing Sitecore,” commented Elycia Arendt, Director of Application Development at NMPD. “Sitecore integrates well with our digital ecosystem. Its headless architecture and ease of integration with our platforms were critical factors in our decision. It’s also exciting technology for our development team to work with.” Sitecore solutions seamlessly integrate with NMDP’s Salesforce CRM system and Okta for identity and access management. With Sitecore, NMDP can efficiently manage and deliver content online, connect customer data across its ecosystem, and personalize user experiences. For example, Sitecore is the foundation of NMDP’s new network website — a B2B site that provides thousands of government documents essential for transplant centers and medical professionals. As part of simplifying and unifying the organization’s brand presence, NMDP also conducted a content audit, reviewing more than 4000 pages and over 40,000 files across NMDP’s entire network website. “With Sitecore, we’ve created a website that makes it easier for users to find what they need through enhanced search and personalization, simplifying their work and improving efficiency,” Arendt explained. “The feedback has been overwhelmingly positive.”

outcome.headline: Unifying the brand, streamlining operations, and improving user experiences
outcome.text: With its new websites built on Sitecore, NMDP has unified its brand presence and streamlined its processes. These websites provide a consistent and cohesive online experience that aligns with NMDP’s digital strategy. Featuring simplified navigation, personalization, 90% fewer site pages, and enhanced search capabilities, the new platform significantly improves the user experience, making it easier for users to find the content they need. Within the first two days of launch, the new websites drew 2,500 unique visitors with only five service desk incidents reported. NMDP is now the number one site for ‘bone marrow donation’ searches, and the organization has experienced an increase of 132% in searches for ‘NMDP volunteer’. The benefits extend beyond website users. NMDP has also enhanced productivity and satisfaction for its developers, marketers, and content creators by optimizing operations. “Thanks to Sitecore, we’ve unified processes and made life simpler, enabling the web team to focus on delivering more advanced capabilities rather than spending hours updating content,” commented Arendt. Previously, the organization frequently relied on external agencies to deliver projects and campaigns. Empowered by Sitecore, NMDP can now handle these tasks internally. Marketers can independently create campaigns, develop content, and implement personalization strategies. Sitecore continues to underpin NMDP’s digital transformation.

testimonial.quote: Sitecore is helping drive our digital journey, enabling us to deliver unified, consistent, and targeted experiences to all our audiences.

case_studies.title: Cytiva rapidly updates webpages with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Biotechnology solutions provider rapidly delivers consistent online experiences globally with centralized digital asset management and content management from Sitecore.
case_studies.project_brief: Cytiva, which recently merged with the life sciences business of Pall, is a global provider of technologies and services to advance and accelerate the development, manufacturing, and delivery of novel therapeutics. When the life sciences company decided to improve the brand experience and continuity across local markets, it migrated to Sitecore technology.

challenge.headline: Supporting expansion and localization
challenge.text: Cytiva had distributed website, content, and brand ownership, which resulted in a poor brand experience and a lack of continuity across markets. Cytiva needed a digital platform that supported greater collaboration, rapid expansion, and easier localization.

solution.headline: An agile approach and a composable architecture
solution.text: Cytiva is working with long‑term digital services partner EPAM to migrate its online architecture to a composable approach built on Sitecore technologies, using Sitecore Content Hub DAM and XM Cloud to enable agile, phased deployment across markets.

outcome.headline: Global and local flexibility enable better online experiences
outcome.text: Using Sitecore Content Hub DAM and XM Cloud, Cytiva has rapidly launched 32 additional sites around the world with a hybrid federation model, enabling cross‑geography collaboration and delivering a 900% improvement in the ecommerce experience.

testimonial.quote: “Sitecore’s technology has enabled us to deliver with speed and flexibility, driving a consistent digital experience for our customers across both commerce and marketing content.”

case_studies.title: Greene King boosts bookings with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: UK’s leading pub retailer and brewery improves online customer experiences, increases digital efficiency, and supports brand development by consolidating 1,700 websites on Sitecore.
case_studies.project_brief: Greene King, the leading pub retailer and brewer in the UK, decided to consolidate its 1,704 websites, hosted on 80 different domains, to a single environment. Its new website foundations are built on composable Sitecore technologies to align with its digital strategy. As a result of the transformation, Greene King has increased customer booking conversions, streamlined content creation and management, and can easily support new brand development initiatives.

challenge.headline: Consolidating websites from 80 domains
challenge.text: Greene King's websites were spread amongst 80 different web domains, leading to time-consuming manual management, costly upgrades, and the need to rebuild features for each website, resulting in high costs and long lead times. To meet ever-changing customer needs, Greene King wanted a resilient, future-proof digital platform to support customer experiences, engagement, and conversion rates, while empowering marketing teams.

solution.headline: An integrated platform for more than 1,700 websites
solution.text: Greene King migrated 1,704 websites from 80 disparate domains to a composable digital foundation built on Sitecore, in partnership with VML. Sitecore Experience Platform (XP) and Sitecore Experience Manager (XM) are hosted via Sitecore Managed Cloud and combined with Sitecore Content Hub DAM and Sitecore Content Hub Operations to provide an end-to-end platform that makes it easier for teams to find and reuse assets across every channel. Teams now have access to prebuilt features and components, eliminating the need to rebuild capabilities for each site and ensuring consistency with digital design guidelines. The Sitecore solutions also integrate seamlessly with the tools needed to drive quality and maintain a best-in-class experience, such as automated testing and vulnerability identification. As part of the transformation, Greene King has established a continuous improvement team with standardized working practices across the full web development lifecycle, from architecture and developing to testing, release, and support.

outcome.headline: Increasing customer bookings and supporting brand development
outcome.text: Greene King now has the foundations it needs to rapidly build tailored websites that align with its branding, which will help the company achieve its digital ambitions and support business development projects. The website transformation has resulted in a 4% increase in website sessions and a 0.6% increase in booking conversions, which will deliver an internal rate of return of 37% over five years. Greene King has improved the online user experience in multiple ways with its refresh. For example, sites are now optimized for mobile devices, which represent 70% of its users, while greater site speed and performance have boosted Google rankings. The company has also enhanced accessibility for increased inclusivity, updated copy to streamline customer journeys, and made it easier for users to book a table. With Sitecore, the company can better understand customer behavior and conduct testing to enable continuous improvement. For example, the digital team identified that by increasing the prominence of the book button, it was able to enhance click-through to book by 23%. These capabilities combined with streamlined workflows help boost internal efficiency and cultivate a more collaborative way of working between IT, digital, and partner teams.

testimonial.quote: It’s important that our websites are user-friendly and customers have a consistent and positive experience using them. With Sitecore’s market-leading platform, we've been able to improve the customer journey and create the digital foundations we need to support our omnichannel strategy while also streamlining the workflows for our digital teams so they can focus on creating content that resonates with our customers.

case_studies.title: WellSpan personalizes online patient experiences with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Nonprofit health system redesigns website on Sitecore to enable unified, personalized, and secure online experiences.
case_studies.project_brief: WellSpan Health is a nonprofit health system... They redesigned it on Sitecore XM and Sitecore Personalize using a headless architecture to offer cohesive experiences and faster content delivery.

challenge.headline: Disconnected tools result in fragmented online experiences
challenge.text: Legacy CMS and disconnected tools meant patients encountered fragmented experiences, with up to 10 separate systems for tasks like appointments, results, messages, and billing.

solution.headline: A headless architecture simplifies integration and personalization
solution.text: WellSpan built its redesigned site using a headless architecture with Sitecore XM and Personalize on React and Next.js. It integrates MyChart, EHR, Prove identity software, and uses rule-based personalization to show tailored content and secure logged-in dashboards.

outcome.headline: Unified experiences and faster time to market
outcome.text: With Sitecore at the core of WellSpan’s digital platform, new architecture drove a 20% uplift in new user accounts within two months, faster rollouts, two‑week sprint cycles, and better self‑service content.

testimonial.quote: “Now we’re on Sitecore, there’s just so much potential. We’re really excited, both from a technology perspective, and for the efficiency improvements we’re going to achieve.”

case_studies.title: Sitecore drives 443% rise in hotel booking initiations
case_studies.overview: Sitecore helped MLCV’s Grand Casinos transform their customer experience, resulting in a 115%+ increase in bookings.

stats.label: Increase in bookings across all services

case_studies.project_brief: Embracing an innovative business approach, the tribe’s flagship enterprises, Grand Casino Mille Lacs and Grand Casino Hinckley, integrated Sitecore into their digital strategy to increase revenue generation and customer growth.

challenge.headline: Digitizing the casino
