challenge.text: The strategic update aimed to connect the casinos more effectively with their audiences while enhancing internal omnichannel processes and improving efficiency.

solution.headline: Fast, flexible design
solution.text: To reach Grand Casino's ambitious digital goals, MLCV’s digital innovation group road‑mapped a cutting‑edge DXP that integrated Sitecore XM Cloud and Sitecore Search to create an agile, effective solution and increase customer engagement and satisfaction.

outcome.headline: Customer experience transformed
outcome.text: Grand Casino immediately saw positive results and business impact from implementing Sitecore and improving the customer experience. Hotel booking initiations increased by 443%, overall bookings rose by 115%, return visits grew by 22%, and abandoned bookings dropped by 53%.

testimonial.quote: Working with Sitecore has been pivotal to achieving our DXP goals. Sitecore’s technology has revolutionized our customer interactions and optimized our internal operations. We've seen a remarkable increase in bookings, customer engagement, and efficiency.

case_studies.title: L'Oréal innovates digital experiences at scale with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: L'Oréal, a global beauty leader, reengineered its Website Factory with a composable Sitecore DXP to manage 320+ websites across 14 brands, achieving significant improvements in consistency, engagement, content management efficiency, and reduced time to market and costs through automation and GenAI.
case_studies.project_brief: L'Oréal's Website Factory reengineered its operations by adopting a composable digital experience platform built on Sitecore, in collaboration with Valtech, to streamline content management, accelerate new website rollouts, and enhance customer engagement across its 320+ brand websites.

challenge.headline: Managing a vast digital presence with manual, time-consuming processes
challenge.text: L'Oréal faced the challenge of managing over 320 websites across 14 brands, ensuring consistency, engagement, and ease of management. Existing manual processes for content optimization and new website rollouts were time-consuming and costly, hindering their competitive edge in time to market.

solution.headline: Composable DXP with GenAI for automated content and translation
solution.text: L'Oréal adopted a composable digital experience platform built on Sitecore, enabling integration of GenAI for meta title and description generation and AI-powered translation (GlobalLink by TransPerfect). Automated content distribution across Sitecore XM instances, with a user-friendly interface for local teams, was a key aspect. TwicPics by Frontify and Cloudflare were used for media optimization.

outcome.headline: Enhanced digital experiences, productivity, and cost reduction at scale
outcome.text: The Sitecore platform allows L'Oréal to control digital experiences at scale, driving continuous improvements in user engagement, internal productivity, and cost reduction. Automation of content distribution and translation significantly reduced costs, work hours, and time to market for new content, gaining a competitive advantage.

testimonial.quote: Sitecore has enabled them to craft unique online experiences for each brand while leveraging enhancements and optimizations across their extensive website portfolio.

case_studies.title: Bayer’s Sitecore-powered intranet delivers €600k yearly savings
case_studies.overview: World‑leading life sciences firm consolidates 300 portals into a single personalized intranet, cutting annual costs by 46% and saving €600 k.
case_studies.project_brief: Every morning Judyta Brauer, Project Manager at Bayer in Poland, logs into the BayerNet corporate intranet and is presented with news, information, and resources personalized entirely for her... All this is enabled by a Sitecore‑powered DXP that consolidated multiple separate portals and CMS applications into a single centralized platform...

challenge.headline: Support 90,000 employees in 80 countries
challenge.text: Bayer was using 300 portals across four CMS solutions, resulting in static homepages, extensive navigation and limited localization. Employees were frustrated and analytics/operations were costly and inefficient.

solution.headline: Consolidate 300 portals and four CMS
solution.text: Bayer implemented a Sitecore‑powered DXP to unify 300 portals and four CMS solutions into a single intranet called BayerNet. This solution, built with Sitecore and Tata Consultancy Services, integrated with SAP, ServiceNow, and Microsoft, creating a global editorial process supported by one cross‑functional team.

outcome.headline: 90,000 personalized homepages
outcome.text: Employees now receive tailored homepages and newsletters, content duplication dropped 70%, annual costs fell from €1.3 M to €700 k, and BayerNet achieved best‑in‑class scores in 6 of 9 benchmark categories (41.5 vs 38.1).

testimonial.quote: “The intranet transformation has greatly improved employee experience and engagement. Its immense scale and proven success make it a pivotal achievement for our team and the company.”

case_studies.title: POLIMI GSoM achieves digital transformation in 6 months with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Global top‑100 business school delivers 100% better operational efficiency, 300% faster website, and cuts time to revenue to 5 minutes.
case_studies.project_brief: To maintain its reputation as a world‑leading business school, it has transformed its student experience with Sitecore. Students now have far better access to course information and a simpler and faster route to learning enrollment and learning success.

challenge.headline: Mending disparate solutions
challenge.text: But it was hindered by disparate solutions across various customer services, leading to fragmented experiences and operational inefficiencies. Several student‑facing frontend technologies were complex to manage and inconsistent for users. Data flow and operations were stifled by poor integration between internal and external systems.

solution.headline: Delivering a unified experience
solution.text: Collaborating with Sitecore and its business partner Avanade, POLIMI GSoM has deployed Sitecore OrderCloud, Sitecore Search, Sitecore XM Cloud, and Sitecore Personalize. It has established a unified experience for website navigation and commerce... The Sitecore DXP integrates with the Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM application... The headless and Next.js technology allowed more development flexibility and faster time to market...

outcome.headline: Digital transformation in just 6 months
outcome.text: Integrating ecommerce and a new payment system into the new website has automated sales and cut time from sale to enrolled student to just five minutes. Consolidating previous systems onto the Sitecore DXP... means website, ecommerce, and student services are managed via one front end...

testimonial.quote: The unified approach to digital transformation delivered by Sitecore and Avanade not only enhances operational efficiency by eliminating manual data duplication and errors, but also promises to elevate user experiences.

case_studies.title: Unbound empowers more families to overcome poverty with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Enhanced digital engagement boosts donations and sponsorship, so nonprofit organization can help more families in need.
case_studies.project_brief: Unbound partners with families in poverty, providing financial support to help them achieve self-sufficiency. Having used Sitecore since 2009, it upgraded to Sitecore XP in 2023, enabling personalized digital experiences for sponsors and empowering marketing teams to manage content updates. By streamlining processes, enhancing donor engagement, and adopting a digital-first approach, Unbound can expand its reach, increase donations, and help more families in need.

stats.label: of sponsor experience now via website
of donors now select digital engagement

challenge.headline: Driving digital engagement to direct more money to families in need
challenge.text: Unbound partners with families living in poverty, providing financial support to help them achieve self-sufficiency and realize their potential. Rated A+ by CharityWatch and highly ranked by Charity Navigator, Candid, and GreatNonprofits, Unbound channels funds raised through sponsorship programs directly to families, empowering them to invest in education, home improvements, or small businesses. Traditionally, Unbound’s donor communications relied heavily on paper, including mailed letters, printed receipts, and phone-based sponsor experiences. To enhance sponsor engagement, reduce costs, and direct more funds to families in need, Unbound decided to expand its digital approach. The organization also aims to attract a younger generation of sponsors by building stronger digital capabilities.

solution.headline: Dynamic digital content transforms sponsor experiences
solution.text: Since 2009, Unbound has trusted Sitecore solutions to power its website. In 2023, the organization upgraded to Sitecore XP as part of its digital transformation. This upgrade was completed seamlessly, with zero downtime, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences and safeguarding the continuity of online donations. In December 2023, Unbound introduced a new feature powered by Sitecore XP that allows supporters to explore its ‘Agents of Change’ proposals and directly fund initiatives they are passionate about. These proposals represent small, local projects with the potential to create meaningful community transformation. Using Sitecore, Unbound delivers dynamic content tailored to website users and can update it rapidly. This capability is crucial since 90% of the sponsor experience now occurs online. Sponsors can access video messages from sponsored families and receive regular updates that deepen engagement. The platform also personalizes content. For example, users interested in education will see information about the scholarship program, while those drawn to community development are presented with details on Agents of Change projects. During emergencies, such as natural disasters, Unbound can swiftly create and launch campaigns to raise funds for those in need. Unbound continues to invest in a digital-first approach. In 2024, it introduced a QR code for its appeals process, enabling digital sign-ups, and added a Zendesk-powered chatbot to its website. The organization has also launched SMS campaigns with direct links to its website, making it as simple as possible for supporters to donate.

outcome.headline: Better engagement boosts fundraising
outcome.text: With its new website built on Sitecore, Unbound delivers digital experiences that resonate with donors and sponsors. The organization’s website welcomes one million visits annually, offering each user a personalized experience - whether they are looking to sponsor a family, learn more about Unbound’s activities, or contribute to an Agents of Change proposal. Since its inception, the Agents of Change program has funded more than 2,200 initiatives. In 2023 alone, 543 community improvement projects were completed across 15 countries, supported by more than $522,000 in grant funding. Using Sitecore XP also enhances internal operations. The platform empowers the marketing team to independently update web pages without relying on developers. This streamlines workflows, enables faster updates, and allows developers to focus on more complex projects. By combining cost savings from its digital-first approach with stronger engagement, Unbound is able to reach new audiences, boost fundraising efforts, and support more families in need.

testimonial.quote: With Sitecore, we’ve improved digital engagement with our sponsors, increased efficiency, and reduced our costs, which helps us direct more funds to families in need.

case_studies.title: Achmea achieves 30% growth in digital pensions with Sitecore
case_studies.overview: Achmea's Pension & Life division (dP&L) transformed its website using Sitecore Experience Platform (XP) 10.3, leading to significant growth in digital pensions, improved personalized pension plans, increased new site visits, longer time spent on site, more returning visitors, streamlined employee workflows, and increased content management efficiency.
case_studies.project_brief: By upgrading to Sitecore Experience Platform (XP) 10.3 with the help of implementation partner HCLTech, Achmea transformed its website to offer self-service features and automation, digitalizing its My Future pension management program.

challenge.headline: Enhancing online customer engagement and digitalizing pension management
challenge.text: Achmea aimed to enhance online customer engagement through personalization and automation, and to digitalize its My Future pension management program, moving away from traditional, less efficient methods.

solution.headline: Upgrading to Sitecore Experience Platform (XP) 10.3 for self-service and automation
solution.text: Achmea upgraded to Sitecore Experience Platform (XP) 10.3, collaborating with implementation partner HCLTech, to transform its website by introducing self-service features and automation.

outcome.headline: Significant growth in digital pensions and improved efficiency
outcome.text: The transformation resulted in significant growth in digital pensions, improved personalized pension plan delivery, increased new site visits, longer time on site, and more returning visitors. Additionally, employee workflows were streamlined, and content management efficiency increased.

testimonial.quote: We took a cross-functional approach to successfully lead the Pensions division through change and digital innovation to achieve their strategic priorities.
testimonial.author_title: Team Manager of IT Keten dP&L Change
